title: Roasted Brussels sprouts with apples and cranberries
ingredients: ['450g Brussels sprouts', '1 large Granny Smith apple - peeled, cored and diced', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '2 tablespoons maple syrup', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '30g dried cranberries, or more to taste', '30g toasted, salted walnuts']
